projects.name: To-Do App built in React using Zustand
projects.description: The To-Do App is a user-friendly task management application built with React and Zustand for state management. It features a responsive design, Vite, and allows users to easily add, update, and manage their tasks.

projects.name: Movie Site built in React
projects.description: This project is a multi-page movie site built with React, featuring dynamic content fetched from a movie API. Users can explore movies, view details, and navigate across pages, showcasing React's component-based architecture and API integration.

projects.name: Happy Thoughts built in React
projects.description: Happy Thoughts is a Twitter-like application built with React that allows users to post and fetch thoughts via an API. It leverages React state management and API handling to create a smooth and interactive user experience.

projects.name: Weather App built in Javascript
projects.description: This project involves building a weather dashboard that uses a weather API to display current weather, temperature, and a 4-day forecast. This project also involves implementing a design created by a designer, providing an opportunity to work with external designs and refine both development and UI integration skills.
